title: Amazing cover font - what is it!??
content:
Hello, just came across this beauty and would love to know more about the face.

Any ideas?  
Thanks,  
A

author: propertyofparkdale

comments.content: I'm following this one... Really like the font to!
I know! I'm in love with the ligatures.
... anybody? I got a bit hooked on this one. ;) Hopefully some of the type wizards in here knows?
I never did find out what this is but Tango is a close (and sadly not as awesome) relative.
Where is the sample from, Mr Harris?
